verbs.description: Whatever [V: steps] [ARGM-ADJ: Iranian leaders take after Donald Trump ’s decision to withdraw from the nuclear accord] , none will be more critical to domestic stability than their efforts to minimize the economic damage .

Whatever steps Iranian leaders take after Donald Trump ’s decision to withdraw from the nuclear accord , none [V: will] be more critical to domestic stability than their efforts to minimize the economic damage .

Whatever steps Iranian leaders take after Donald Trump ’s decision to withdraw from the nuclear accord , none will be more critical to domestic stability than their efforts to [V: minimize] [ARG1: the economic damage] .
